landing.about_text1: We are more than just a bank. Since 2020, we've been revolutionizing the banking experience for over 50,000 customers in Germany.
landing.about_text2: Our mission is to make banking simple, transparent, and accessible to everyone. With cutting-edge technology and a customer-first approach, we're setting new standards.
landing.contact_subtitle: Have questions? We're here for you!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Empowering financial freedom for everyone
mission.statement: At DEspendables, we believe banking should be simple, transparent, and accessible. Our mission is to democratize financial services through innovative technology while maintaining the highest standards of security and regulatory compliance.
mission.value_security_desc: Your financial safety is our top priority. We employ bank-grade encryption and multi-factor authentication.
mission.value_innovation_desc: We continuously evolve our platform with cutting-edge technology to serve you better.
mission.value_transparency_desc: No hidden fees, no surprises. We believe in clear, honest communication.
mission.value_customer_desc: Your needs drive our decisions. We're here to serve you, not the other way around.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Shaping the future of banking
vision.statement: We envision a world where banking is seamless, intelligent, and empowering. By 2030, we aim to be Europe's leading digital bank, serving millions with innovative financial solutions.
vision.initiative_ai_desc: Advanced machine learning for personalized financial advice
vision.initiative_blockchain_desc: Secure, transparent transactions using distributed ledger technology
vision.initiative_open_desc: Seamless integration with third-party financial services
vision.initiative_sustainability_desc: Carbon-neutral operations and green investment options
